participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: Tom is laid-back and enjoys the simple pleasures in life. He has a friendly demeanor and loves sharing stories about his time grilling with friends and family.
participant_1.background: i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i have been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: George is ambitious and a bit eccentric. He has a unique lifestyle as a bee farmer and takes pride in his unusual career choice. He often reflects on his life choices and values independence.
participant_2.background: my favorite food is papaya. my name is george. i am a bee farmer. i married a super model from italy. i've zero family that i'm close to.
